segments.text: What is your policy on returns ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you bring them back with your receipt within seven days , you'll get a full refund . Also , if you need alterations to the pants , just bring them in and we'll do them for free .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That'll be $ 70 , please . Will you be paying by cash or charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , sir , here you are . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
